Class MouseEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • com.intellij.util.ui.MouseEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

    public abstract class MouseEventHandler
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener

      protected abstract void handle(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
